name: Cash_Out Career Mode (Demo Day 6)
description:
Would like to do some work with career mode so I need some feedback on the current system.

It works mostly the same besides that you can't select your character, and the difficulty is capped at normal.

There's an advanced tutorial in the "extras" section, you probably won't need it at "Normal" difficulty though.

Everything should work besides that, if not feel free to post in the comments.

Enjoy!
